detail_desc: Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for optimum fit.

Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover and flounced trim at the front. Long sleeves with elasticated trumpet cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with ties at one side, and a flounced trim at the hems.
Calf-length, flared skirt in airy cotton and modal seersucker. Side pockets and a high paper bag waist with pleats, elastication and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif, chest pocket, narrow ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Skirt in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back.
Adjustable metal chain waist belt decorated with plastic beads. Carabiner hook at one end.
Metal necklaces in various lengths and designs with plastic and wooden beads. Adjustable length 39-47 cm and 75.5-83 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in various designs. Adjustable length, 42-49.5 cm, 55-62.5 cm and 65-72.5 cm..
Long, multi-strand metal necklace decorated with beads made of reconstituted stone and metal pendants. Adjustable length 57-65 cm.
Lace bralette with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal chain necklaces chains in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Earrings with a round metal disc at the top and large, resin, shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 7 cm.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs of the earrings are in acetate and resin. Length 4-6 cm.
Earrings with a hammered metal disc and a shell pendant. Length 4 cm.
Earrings in hammered metal and resin. One pair of large studs, one pair of hoops and one pair with a long pendant. Length 2 cm, 3 cm and 6 cm.

Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin lapels, a chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief, and flap welt front pockets. Button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Decorative, crossover straps at the front and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Decorative, crossover straps at the front and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Non-wired bra with a lace-covered front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped waist, lined gusset, opening at the back with decorative, crossover straps and a high cut at the back.
Gym bag in woven fabric with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Size 35x44.5 cm.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger. Four with polished plastic stones.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger. Four with polished plastic stones.
Thin hoop earrings with plastic beads. Diameter 3.5 cm.
Soft bootees in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Ribbed shaft and soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Jersey lining.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length 5.5 cm.
Earrings in metal and acetate. Two pairs of larger hoops and two pairs with pendants. Length 4.5-6 cm.
Flat, round earrings in marled acetate. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Large, round metal earrings with an embossed finish. Width 2.3 cm and 4.5 cm. Length approx. 7.5 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with plastic and glass beads.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with plastic and glass beads.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length approx. 5.3 cm.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with plastic bead pendants. Sizes from 3.5 to 4 cm.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Long metal earrings with pearly plastic beads. Length 6.5 cm.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Long earrings in hammered metal. Length 8 cm.
Hoop earrings in various designs and sizes. One metal pair, two plastic pairs. Diameter 2.5 cm, 3 cm, 4 cm.

Pull-on trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.

Pull-on trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Short shorts in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a high, elasticated waist and side pockets.
Body in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover V-neck, gently draping at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Body in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover V-neck, gently draping at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Short top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless V-neck body in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short coat in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Concealed button at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle and metal-covered belt tip.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle and metal-covered belt tip.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle and button stud fasteners. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.

Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric made from a wool blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
